item.text: There was a man named Micah from the Ephraimite hill country.

He said to his mother, “You know the 1,100 pieces of silver which were stolen from you, about which I heard you pronounce a curse? Look here, I have the silver. I stole it, but now I am giving it back to you.” His mother said, “May the Lord reward you, my son!”

When he gave back to his mother the 1,100 pieces of silver, his mother said, “I solemnly dedicate this silver to the Lord. It will be for my son’s benefit. We will use it to make a carved image and a metal image.”

When he <st data-num="07725" class="">gave</st> the <st data-num="03701" class="">silver</st> <st data-num="07725" class="">back</st> to his <st data-num="0517" class="">mother</st>, <st data-num="0517" class="">she</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="03947 05414">took</st> <st data-num="03967" class="">200</st> <st data-num="03701" class="">pieces of silver</st><n id="2" /> to a <st data-num="06884" class="">silversmith</st>, who <st data-num="06213" class="">made</st> them into a <st data-num="06459" class="">carved image</st> and a <st data-num="04541" class="">metal image</st>. She then <st data-num="01961" class="">put</st> them in <st data-num="04319" class="">Micah’s</st> <st data-num="01004" class="">house</st>.<n id="3" />

Now this <st data-num="0376" class="">man</st> <st data-num="04318" class="">Micah</st> owned a <st data-num="01004 0430">shrine</st>.<n id="1" /> He <st data-num="06213" class="">made</st> an <st data-num="0646" class="">ephod</st><n id="2" /> and some <st data-num="08655" class="">personal idols</st> and <st data-num="04390 03027">hired</st> <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> of his <st data-num="01121" class="">sons</st> to <st data-num="01961" class="">serve</st> as a <st data-num="03548" class="">priest</st>.<n id="3" />
In those days Israel had no king. Each man did what he considered to be right.
There was a young man from Bethlehem in Judah. He was a Levite who had been temporarily residing among the tribe of Judah.

This <st data-num="0376" class="">man</st> <st data-num="01980" class="">left</st> the <st data-num="05892" class="">town</st> of <st data-num="01035" class="">Bethlehem</st> in <st data-num="03063" class="">Judah</st> to <st data-num="04672" class="">find</st> another <st data-num="0834" class="">place</st> to <st data-num="01481" class="">live</st>. He <st data-num="0935" class="">came</st> to the <st data-num="0669" class="">Ephraimite</st> <st data-num="02022" class="">hill country</st> and <st data-num="06213" class="">made</st> his <st data-num="01870" class="">way</st> <st data-num="05704" class="">to</st> <st data-num="04318" class="">Micah’s</st> <st data-num="01004" class="">house</st>.<n id="1" />

<st data-num="04318" class="">Micah</st> <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st> to him, “<st data-num="0370" class="">Where</st> do you <st data-num="0935" class="">come</st> from?” He <st data-num="0559 0413">replied</st>, “<st data-num="0595" class="">I</st> am a <st data-num="03881" class="">Levite</st> from <st data-num="01035" class="">Bethlehem</st> in <st data-num="03063" class="">Judah</st>. <st data-num="0595" class="">I</st> am <st data-num="01980 04672">looking for</st> a new <st data-num="0834" class="">place</st> to <st data-num="01481" class="">live</st>.”<n id="1" />

<st data-num="04318" class="">Micah</st> <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st> to him, “<st data-num="03427" class="">Stay</st> <st data-num="05978" class="">with</st> me. <st data-num="01961" class="">Become</st> my <st data-num="01" class="">adviser</st><n id="1" /> and <st data-num="03548" class="">priest</st>. <st data-num="0595" class="">I</st> will <st data-num="05414" class="">give</st> you <st data-num="06235" class="">10</st> <st data-num="03701" class="">pieces of silver</st> per <st data-num="03117" class="">year</st>, plus <st data-num="06187 0899">clothes</st> and <st data-num="04241" class="">food</st>.”<n id="2" />

So the <st data-num="03881" class="">Levite</st> <st data-num="02974" class="">agreed</st> to <st data-num="03427" class="">stay</st> <st data-num="0854" class="">with</st> the <st data-num="0376" class="">man</st>; the <st data-num="05288" class="">young man</st> <st data-num="01961" class="">was</st> like <st data-num="0259" class="">a</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> to Micah.<n id="1" />

<st data-num="04318" class="">Micah</st> <st data-num="04390 03027">pai</st>d<n id="1" /> the <st data-num="03881" class="">Levite</st>; the <st data-num="05288" class="">young man</st> <st data-num="01961" class="">became</st> his <st data-num="03548" class="">priest</st> and <st data-num="01961" class="">lived</st> in <st data-num="04318" class="">Micah’s</st> <st data-num="01004" class="">house</st>.
Micah said, “Now I know the Lord will make me rich because I have this Levite as my priest.”
